long_description: The Outdoor Research Sentinel hat helps protect youngsters from bug-borne misery and damaging sun exposure. Supplex(R) nylon is treated with Insect Shield(R) to repel mosquitos, ticks, ants, flies, chiggers and no-see-ums. EPA-registered Insect Shield(R) is an odorless treatment that lasts for approximately 70 washes. SolarShield(TM) fabric provides UPF 30 protection from the sun's rays. The Outdoor Research Sentinel hat features a soft, moisture-wicking headband for added comfort.
short_description: The Outdoor Research Sentinel hat helps protect youngsters from bug-borne misery and damaging sun exposure.
